properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ENROLLDATE , MEM_MODIFYDATE , MEM_STATUS , MEM_NICKNAME , MEM_GRADE , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF , MEM_IMGPATH , WITHDRAW FROM MEMBER WHERE (MEM_STATUS = 'Y' OR MEM_STATUS = 'A') AND MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?
SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(MEM_ID,1,3), LENGTH(MEM_ID), '*') AS"MEM_ID" FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND MEM_EMAIL = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_PHONE = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_NICKNAME = ? , ADDRESS_CODE = ? , ADDRESS = ? , ADDRESS_DETAIL = ? , ADDRESS_REF = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_PHONE , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_NICKNAME , ADDRESS_CODE , ADDRESS , ADDRESS_DETAIL , ADDRESS_REF FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REM.MEM_NICKNAME , SRM.MEM_ID , SR.REVIEW_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE FROM REPORT RE JOIN MEMBER REM ON (RE.MEM_NO = REM.MEM_NO) JOIN STORE_RE SR ON (RE.RE_NO = SR.RE_NO) JOIN MEMBER SRM ON (SR.REVIEW_WRITER = SRM.MEM_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' , WITHDRAW = ? WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ?

SELECT M.MEM_ID, (SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_WRITER) FROM STORE_RE S WHERE M.MEM_NO = S.REVIEW_WRITER) AS STORE_REVIEW, (SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_WRITER) FROM PRODUCT_REVIEW P WHERE M.MEM_NO = P.REVIEW_WRITER) AS PRODUCT_REVIEW, (SELECT SUM(MPS_RECORD) FROM MPS_POINT MP WHERE M.MEM_NO = MP.MEM_NO) AS MPS_POINT, (SELECT COUNT(MEM_NO) FROM STORE_SCRAP SS WHERE M.MEM_NO = SS.MEM_NO) AS STORE_SCRAP, (SELECT COUNT(FING_MNO) FROM FOLLOW F WHERE M.MEM_NO = F.F_MNO) AS FOLLOW FROM MEMBER M WHERE MEM_ID = ?
